verses.text: A eb' chuc spensar sna eb' to malaj Dios. Junlajanxonhej ix aj sjuanel spensar eb'. Yelxo val te chuc sk'ulej eb'. Malaj mach sk'ulan vach'il.
Ato d'a satchaanh q'uelanemta Jehová d'a anima, yic syila' tato ay eb' syak'och spensar d'ay, yic syilpaxi tato naan yuj eb'.
A juntzanh b'eyb'al chuc sb'eyb'alej eb' smasanil. Junlajanxonhej tz'aj sjuvib'at eb'. Malaj junoc mach b'oan vach' b'eyb'al. Toton malaj val junoc mach.
Icha val to malaj spensar eb' sk'ulan chucal chi'. A eb' chi' satanel eb' yetchonhab', icha val to svael eb' yaj eb', max yal-laj sb'a eb' d'a Jehová.
Ste ib'xi eb' yuj xivelal, yujto a Dios ayek' yed' eb' vach' sb'eyb'al.
Snib'ej eb' syixtejb'at tas nab'il yuj eb' emnaquil, palta a Jehová scolan eb' emnaquil chi'.
Comonoc a d'a tzalan Sion scot co colnab'il a onh israel onh tic. Ayic ol yak'anxi svach'k'olal Dios d'a quib'anh, ol tzalaj val co k'ool a onh yinhtil onh vinhaj Jacob tic. Ol el lenaj ol quila'.
